Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-31449 affecting package redis for versions less than 6.2.14-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-31449 affecting package redis for versions less than 6.2.14-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package redis is earlier than 6.2.14-3, affected by CVE-2024-31449
